EmailTemplate.name: 2017 EMEAI Paris Ops Conf_Irina.2017 EMEAI Paris Ops Conf_Irina
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Operator Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> PARIS OPERATOR FORUM Please join us. Date June 15th, 2017
Time 11:00-14:00
Location l’AC Marriott Hotel Paris Le Bourget Airport
You are kindly invited to join us at the upcoming Honeywell Operator Forum in Paris. It will be a great opportunity to find out about Honeywell latest products and services, whilst networking over lunch with colleagues and industry peers. Please RSVP by June 11th and please do feel free to forward this invitation to your colleagues and contacts within the local business aviation community.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[mailto:anna.tomova@honeywell.com]]>
